Title: Go all out and aim high. The East leaps forward, the West is worried
Designer: Zhang Ruji (张汝济)Wang Shuhui (王叔晖)Shao Guohuan (邵国寰)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The characters on the sails read 'greater, faster, better, cheaper' - indicating production. Below right are the United Kingdom and the USA, shipwrecked on the islands "经济 - 危机": economic crisis.
